description: Eiri, a talented art student, works part-time in an antique shop in a quiet part of town. One afternoon, he uncovers a delicate Venetian glass that holds a startling secret. When Eiri peers into the glass, he can see a young blond...
name: Cossette no shôzô

review.name: Ugly art, it's not really that thrilling at all....
review.reviewBody:
Just found the art was rather boring, the faces on the characters were like stone faced that just put me off in all honesty. Maybe I'm not a fan of a lot of old anime animation but if its done right as well as the story, no problem. However both in this anime case did. The story was just so unoriginal and boring. It was like it came from the Annabelle series but in a lighter tone.

Yeah I'm out with this anime unfortunately.....
